text: the goal of intelligent document
processing is to help your organization
make faster and more accurate Decisions
by applying AI to process your paperwork
this video will highlight the AWS AI
technology that our customer use to
speed their business process these AI
Technologies can be used across
Insurance including claims underwriting
customer correspondence or contracts one
of the ways AI helps speed up decisions
is recognizing if a set of documents is
complete and has the in necessary
information for a decision to be made
over time the amount of human help that
is needed to process documents is
reduced as the AI improves let's dive
deeper into the first claim so we can
see how the process works documents can
come in from multiple channels such as
mail room emails admin portals and in
multiple file formats figuring out what
you have is the first step our AI was
able to classify what types of documents
were received but the fifth one didn't
meet the business rule that require
human review if the AI confidence score
is below 85 percent let's click on the
preview of the document file see what it
is and this is an insurance card in this
example the AI correctly predicted that
it was an insurance ID but The
Confidence Code didn't meet the required
level so a human review was required now
that the documents are classified let's
go to the next step looking at the form
the AI is able to read all the key value
pairs for example total charge for a
five dollar and structured the results
so they can be easily used by your
Downstream system this technology also
works for handwritten text as well as
checkbox at the very bottom of the form
there is a table the AI keeps the
headers rows columns cells organized
align the procedure date in charges to
be extracted accurately the AI can also
find key value pairs in documents like
this in ID card let's take a quick look
at the raw text AWS AI transforms this
difficult to process group of words into
useful information that we saw on the
result tab to speed up processing
invoices our AI provides you with
standardized field names such as total
or who sent the invoice if you need
details the line items are also
extracted many businesses need to find
information that is unique to their use
case which is hidden inside the dense
text type of documents based on the
limited number of labeled examples that
you provide the AI is designed to
recognize pieces of information that are
important to your business such as
person name or patient ID
this technology is also used to identify
key information in your contracts now
let's see how business rules can be set
up for your IDP workflow the business
rules that you set up are based on your
organization's requirement in addition
to making sure all the information is
included you can also set up rules that
match customers names policy number
across documents after the quality
checks are complete the information from
the documents is ready to be sent to the
next step on your business process to
learn more or speak with the document
processing specialist please visit our
website
